header.summary: Guides students and professionals in inner and personal development.

experience.company: Bhaktivedanta Institute for Education and Training
experience.description: Overseeing spiritual education, training, and cultural programs internationally. Conducting classes on Vedic studies, organizing examinations, and awarding Shastric degrees to qualified candidates.

Taught Bhagavad Gita as part of a certificate course, emphasizing its practical application in personal and professional life. Engaged 100+ students every semester in discussions on philosophy, ethics, and leadership.
Teaching Bhagavad Gita as part of Humanity Elective in collaboration with Kurukshetra University.

Providing mentorship to students and professionals from institutions across globe both in person and online. Also conducting Bhagavad Gita seminar and training sessions in collaboration with universities and industries.
